text: Simulates a light with the shape and color of a geometry object you select.
This object emits light into the scene from the surface of the selected
. It uses the geometry object’s surface shader for the colors of the emitted light, so you can create very complex lighting effects using multicolored shaders.
Geometry lights can be expensive to render. For simple cases you may want to try to simulate the effect you want using
. However, the geometry light is very useful since it’s more straightforward than using tricks with simple lights, and it uses the object’s surface shader to color the emitted light.
